A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Though not without flaw\, Star Wars: The Last Jedi is an amazing addition to the Star Wars franchise. It takes risks no one was expecting. The reason it's getting so much backlash from fans is because everyone went in with speculations and theories\, and they were disappointed when what they wanted to happen didn't happen. My only complaints would be the Finn and Rose subplot\, and most of the jokes didn't work for me.
